RTCPeerConnectionAddTransceiver.summary:
The method
addTransceiver() creates a new
and adds it to the set of transceivers associated
with the RTCPeerConnection. Each transceiver represents a
bidirectional stream, with both an and an
associated with it.

remarks.para:
-WebRTC API
-Introduction to the Real-time Transport Protocol (RTP)
- also creates transceivers
- and

RTCPeerConnectionAddTransceiver.returns: The object which will be used to exchange the media data.
